content: So in the meeting today, @oli mentioned that clippy makes a lot of use of the ExprUseVisitor. We should probably take a look at those uses, as I am contemplating proposing a rewrite as part of this WG, and if so we would want to make sure those uses are accommodated.
@nikomatsakis any code you have in mind that we can look at to get an idea ?
Well, these are our use sites: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/search?q=ExprUseVisitor&unscoped_q=ExprUseVisitor
I'm certain some of these could be written differently (e.g. as a MIR-lint), so if that's preferrable, I'd be happy to rewrite some of these
